ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EQ] Mysteries of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: They have Soulfire, which Im told is a required component in the Fiery Avenger Quest.... Tho how anyone knows that I dont know. If you see someone kiting Sir
ygData.messageBody:
They have Soulfire, which Im told is a required component in the Fiery Avenger Quest.... Tho how anyone knows that I dont know. If you see someone kiting Sir Lucan around newbie Freeport, they are doing the Soulfire Quest.

Shannyn



>>> "Lan" <lanh@...> 12/30/99 10:18AM >>>
That Sword is Soul Fire [i think]
